text: The 2018–19 Austrian football championship was the 108th season. The highest level is the Austrian Bundesliga. It was played by 12 teams. They initially determine the participants in the championship and qualification groups in two rounds. The Austrian football champion and the first three representatives of Austria in the international competitions of the 2019-20 season, will then be determined in the championship group. ==Mode == In the 2018/19 season, twelve clubs competed against each other for the first time in 22 rounds. Each team played once at home and away against each other team. The best six teams then went into the championship group and the remaining six into the qualification group. The points from the basic round were halved and half points rounded down. If two clubs had been tied on points at the end of the final round and one of these clubs had had half a point rounded down, that club would have been ranked higher. ==Table initial rounds== Pl.
